title: It’s Okay to Cry: WWE Women Face Sexist Backlash for Crying, “Over-Celebrating” After Matches - There's plenty of crying in wrestling.
text:
It’s Okay to Cry: WWE Women Face Sexist Backlash for Crying, “Over-Celebrating” After Matches - There's plenty of crying in wrestling. 
Published By: Geekosystem - Today 
In a Forbe's piece entitled "WWE's Future Is Gender-Neutral And Filled With Tears," writer Alfred Konuwa argues that "the next big step" for...
